content: to all our friends… we raise a cup i have really missed going for a coffee and a chat with my friends so how better to think of them than with these really cute cuppas both coffee and hot chocolate designs 4 different embroidery ideas all described in minute detail suitable for advanced beginner/intermediate level 9 page written pattern this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is for personal use only it is permitted to make items from this pattern to sell for charitable purposes provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
